TELEMETRY REF AF_ASSERT_2 BIG_ENDIAN "An assert happened"
    <%=render "_ref_tlm_evr_hdr.txt", locals: {id: 343} %>

    APPEND_ITEM FILE_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM FILE 0 STRING "The source file of the assert"
    ITEM LINE -96 32 UINT "Line number of the assert"
    ITEM ARG1 -64 32 UINT "First assert argument"
    ITEM ARG2 -32 32 UINT "Second assert argument"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf("Assert in file %s, line %d: %d %d" , packet.read('file') , packet.read('line') , packet.read('arg1') , packet.read('arg2') )
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
    ITEM EVR_SEVERITY 0 0 DERIVED "Severity"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf('FATAL')
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_END
